meanings.sent1: The bird will overfly the river to reach its nest on the other side.
meanings.sent2: The airplane will overfly the city on its way to the next destination.
meanings.sent3: The superhero can overfly the entire city in just a few seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams overfly the boundaries of reality, soaring high above.
meanings.sent5: The eagle's wings allow it to gracefully overfly the vast landscape below.

meanings.sent1: The clouds overfly the mountains, casting shadows on the valleys below.
meanings.sent2: The helicopter will overfly the traffic jam to reach the accident site quickly.
meanings.sent3: The magician's cape seems to overfly his body as he performs his tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter can overfly any sadness, bringing joy to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The kite's string broke, causing it to overfly the park and land in a tree.

meanings.sent1: The migratory birds overfly vast distances to reach their wintering grounds.
meanings.sent2: The hot air balloon will overfly the countryside, offering breathtaking views.
meanings.sent3: The paper airplane can overfly the classroom, much to the teacher's surprise.
meanings.sent4: His words overfly any language barrier, connecting people from different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The drone was programmed to overfly the area and capture aerial footage for the movie.
